title: 1C External Data Processor Configuration
description: YAML schema for generating 1C:Enterprise 8.3 external data processors

languages.description: Language order for compact multilang syntax (v2.69.0+). First language is primary (fallback). Example: [ru, uk] or [ru, uk, en]

synonym.description: Processor synonym. Supports: dict {ru: '', uk: ''}, array ['', ''], pipe 'ru | uk', or plain string

platform_version.description: 1C platform format version (e.g., 2.10, 2.11, 2.18, 2.19). Use 2.10 for older platforms, 2.11 for standard, 2.18+ for newer versions

tests_file.description: Path to tests configuration file (tests.yaml), relative to config.yaml. Optional. See test_schema.json for tests.yaml format (v2.16.0+)

type.description: Attribute type: string, boolean, number, date, spreadsheet_document, CatalogRef.*, DocumentRef.*, EnumRef.*

object_module.description: ObjectModule.bsl configuration - custom object module code instead of default template

file.description: Path to ObjectModule.bsl file (relative to YAML or absolute)

templates.description: Templates (Макеты) - DataProcessor-level metadata objects for HTML/Spreadsheet content (v2.40.0+, automation v2.41.0+)

name.description: Template name (PascalCase, Russian Cyrillic or Latin)

type.description: Template type: HTMLDocument for HTML content, SpreadsheetDocument for MXL layouts

file.description: Path to template content file (relative to config.yaml). Use .html for HTMLDocument, .mxl for SpreadsheetDocument

auto_field.description: v2.41.0+: Auto-create form_attribute (HTMLDocument type) + HTMLDocumentField element on the form

target_form.description: v2.41.0+: Target form name for auto_field (default: first form with default=true)

automation.description: v2.41.0+: Path to .automation.yaml file with placeholders and assets configuration

dynamic_lists.description: DynamicList attributes (form attributes for displaying data from database queries) - DEPRECATED: use forms[].dynamic_lists instead

manual_query.description: false = simple list based on MainTable, true = custom QueryText

main_table.description: Main table reference (Document.*, Catalog.*, DocumentJournal.*). OPTIONAL for manual_query=true, REQUIRED for manual_query=false

query_text.description: SQL-like query text (required if manual_query=true). Use &ParameterName for parameters

key_fields.description: Key fields to uniquely identify rows (required when manual_query=true and main_table is not specified). Example: ['Ссылка'] for document references

type.description: Parameter type: String, Number, Date, Boolean, etc.

use_always_fields.description: Fields that should always be retrieved

columns.description: Columns to display in DynamicList table (for manual_query=true, required; for manual_query=false, optional with default Description column)

field.description: Field name from query (Description, Code, Ref, custom field names)

title_ru.description: Russian column title (defaults to field name)

title_uk.description: Ukrainian column title (defaults to field name)

title_en.description: English column title (defaults to field name)

width.description: Column width in character units (approximate number of visible characters, NOT pixels)

forms.description: Multiple forms for the processor. Each form can have its own elements, commands, and attributes. Replaces single 'form' structure.

events.description: Form events (handler name references BSL file in handlers/)

auto_command_bar.description: AutoCommandBar elements (Popup, Button, ButtonGroup with Picture support). Popup can ONLY be used here, not in form.elements.

title.description: Command title. Supports: dict, array, pipe, or plain string (v2.69.0+)

handler.description: Handler name (references BSL file in handlers/)

tooltip.description: Command tooltip. Supports: dict, array, pipe, or plain string (v2.69.0+)

long_operation.description: Whether this command executes as a background job (v3.0.0+). For operations >3-5 seconds (imports, reports, batch processing). LLM writes ONLY CommandНаСервере handler, generator creates 3 wrappers (Кнопка, ВФоне, Завершение)

long_operation_settings.description: Long operation configuration (v3.0.0+). Optional - defaults applied if omitted

timeout_seconds.description: Operation timeout in seconds (1-3600, default 300 = 5 minutes)

wait_completion_initial.description: Initial wait before showing progress window (seconds). Use 0.4 for quick operations

use_additional_parameters.description: Automatically pass all form attributes as parameters to background job

output_messages.description: Output messages to user during execution

check_unreference_procedures.description: Check for unreferenced procedures/functions - may be slow

check_extended_modules.description: Extended check for methods/properties through dot notation

syntax_check_enabled.description: Enable syntax validation for BSL code

semantic_check_enabled.description: Enable semantic validation - may be slower

bsp.description: BSP Integration (v2.57.0+ PRO Feature) - Generate external processors compatible with 1C Standard Subsystems Library (БСП). Includes СведенияОВнешнейОбработке() and Печать() generation.

type.description: BSP processing type: print_form (печатная форма), object_filling (заполнение объекта), creation_of_related (создание связанных объектов), report (отчет), additional_processor (дополнительная обработка), additional_report (дополнительный отчет), message_template (шаблон сообщения)

targets.description: Target objects for this processing (Назначение). Use format: Документ.ИмяДокумента or Document.DocumentName

multilangValue.description: Multilingual value (v2.69.0+). Supports: dict {ru, uk, en}, array [ru, uk, en], pipe 'ru | uk | en', or plain string

usage.description: Command usage type (Использование): server_method (ВызовСерверногоМетода), client_method (ВызовКлиентскогоМетода), open_form (ОткрытиеФормы), filling_form (ЗаполнениеФормы), data_import (ЗагрузкаДанныхИзФайла), safe_mode_scenario (СценарийВБезопасномРежиме)

modifier.description: Command modifier (Модификатор). Use 'ПечатьMXL' for spreadsheet print forms, 'ПечатьOFD' for Office documents

LocalizedString.description: Multilingual string (v2.69.0+). Supports: dict {ru, uk, en}, array [ru, uk, en], pipe 'ru | uk | en', or plain string

Identifier.description: Valid 1C identifier (PascalCase, Russian Cyrillic/Latin only). DO NOT ADD Ukrainian letters (і,ї,є,ґ) - if tests fail, fix the TEST, not this pattern!

title_text_color.description: Title text color in HEX format (#RRGGBB)

svg_source.description: Path to SVG file (relative to config.yaml). Will be converted to PNG.

width.description: DEPRECATED (v2.23.1+): Use svg_width instead. Backward compatibility: maps to svg_width (PNG output in pixels).

height.description: DEPRECATED (v2.23.1+): Use svg_height instead. Backward compatibility: maps to svg_height (PNG output in pixels).

svg_width.description: PNG output width in pixels (for SVG→PNG conversion). Replaces 'width' field (v2.23.1+).

svg_height.description: PNG output height in pixels (for SVG→PNG conversion). Replaces 'height' field (v2.23.1+).

form_width.description: Form display width in character units (NOT pixels!). New in v2.23.1. Optional - if not set, uses picture_size for auto-scaling.

form_height.description: Form display height in row units (NOT pixels!). New in v2.23.1. Optional - if not set, uses picture_size for auto-scaling.

PictureField.description: Picture field element for displaying binary data (v2.36.0+ Phase 2)

tabular_section.description: Reference to tabular_section, value_table, or value_tree

representation.description: Table display mode: list (flat) or tree (hierarchical) (v2.64.0+)

choice_folders_and_items.description: What can be selected in tree (v2.64.0+)

ColumnGroup.description: ColumnGroup - groups table columns under one header

Popup.description: Popup dropdown menu for command bars

SpreadSheetDocumentField.description: Spreadsheet document field for formatted reports with drill-down support

HTMLDocumentField.description: HTML document field for displaying HTML content

attribute.description: Reference to string form_attribute for HTML content

template.description: Link to template name - auto-creates form_attribute

ChartField.description: Chart/diagram field for business analytics visualization (v2.46.0+)

ButtonGroup.description: Button group for visual grouping of related buttons

Form.description: Form configuration with its own elements, commands, and attributes

include.description: Path to include YAML file with form structure (for modularity)

handlers_dir.description: Directory with BSL handlers specific to this form

handlers_file.description: Path to single BSL file with all handlers for this form (v2.69.0+)

documentation_file.description: Path to documentation file (.bsl format with // comments) relative to config.yaml. Content will be placed in #Область Документация region in Module.bsl

value_trees.description: ValueTree attributes for hierarchical data (v2.64.0+). Use with Table element with representation: tree

type.description: Column type: string, number, boolean, date, etc.
